data.title: Arch of Hadrian, Central Athens Regional Unit Podcast
data.meta_description: If you find yourself in Athens, you can't miss the Arch of Hadrian, a monument that encapsulates stories of emperors and ancient civilizations. Built around 131 or 132 AD, this arch was erected to celebrate the visit of Emperor Hadrian, who had strong ties to the city, even becoming an Athenian c...
